caseTitle: Manzoor Hussain @ Babo v. The State, etc
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE QAZI MUHAMMAD AMIN AHMED
tagline: The inherently flawed plea of accidental shot canvassed by the defence cannot dislodge preponderance of evidence furnished by the eye witnesses, found to be in a comfortable unison on all the details, salient as well as collateral.
